categories: Category:Missions of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The Mission to Fallowan was undertaken in 2 ABY by Princess Leia Organa, Han Solo and Chewbacca.
Han used a stormtrooper armor and Leia an Imperial officer uniform to infiltrate a secret Imperial base on Fallowan. The Princess managed to access and slice valuable data in Imperial computers.

However they were discovered by a group of Ugnaught greasers in the hangar while they were leaving the base. They were surrounded by a large number of stormtroopers and Solo decided to steal a swoop bike to flee. Han and Leia were pursued by hovertanks and stormtroopers riding swoops. They were eventually rescued by Chewbacca in the Millennium Falcon.

The Rebels escaped Fallowan and headed to the planet Cataalda in order to deliver the collected data. When they arrived on the planet, they discovered that the Cataalda outpost had been evacuated after having been found by an Imperial patrol.
